ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Syowa Upper Atmosphere Physics Monitoring Data
ResourceHeader.Description: The Syowa Upper Atmosphere Physics Monitoring Data system provides magnetometer data from the Syowa magnetometer in Antarctica located at -69.00 Geographic latitude 39.58 Geographic longitude.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: National Institute of Polar Research; Prof. Natsuo Sato

InformationURL.Name: Magnetometer Data at Syowa Station Data Portal
InformationURL.Description: Online magnetometer data at Syowa station. These data are in a variety of resolutions.
